name: Escape The Rooms:Christmas Room Escapeist Games
name_original: Escape The Rooms:Christmas Room Escapeist Games
description:
You are locked in a room full of Christmas gifts, If you want to leave with your Christmas gifts, you must use your ingenuity to find gifts and keys, ready to accept the challenges of Christmas?

* Unexpected puzzle, let your brain hole open!
* Beautiful Christmas scene, let you enjoy a different Christmas!
* Unique collection system, escape is not the only goal!
